Name: Thrice in a row: Last Adventure
About the game: The final part of a great game Available 28 completely new levels. Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses.
